schools.name: Tulane U School Of Medicine, New Orleans

reviewDetails.comment: Thorough, thoughtful, and formation sharing doctor.
She was on time, friendly, thorough and took the time to explain. I highly recommend her.

I have been with Dr Lebeau for over 8 years now and what I can say is that she is mindful and intentional. She listens to my thoughts, even the things I bring her from my Internet searches 🙂. She welcomes questions in a supportive environment. I am grateful that she supports my IF and ketogenic lifestyle. She is a through clinician and I am glad to have her on my team.
She is wonderful, organized, detailed, thorough and you can tell she cares. Dr Lebeau is great!
Always well prepared for my visits.  Schedules time to spend with patients to answer questions.

I have been a patient of Dr. Lebeau's for about 20 years. Dr. Lebeau is a great patient advocate and a caring physician. She is LGBTQ+ supportive and knowledgeable of our health needs.  I would, and have, recommended her to family and friends. She has been my husband's primary care physician since we married almost 8 years ago.

Dr Lebeau has been my physician for a number years and I have found her to be a consummate professional in every aspect of her practice. She is thoughtful, thorough, sensitive  and brings the kind of comprehensive care that is rare these days. I cannot recommend her enough.

reviewDetails.comment:
My experience with Dr. Kwon was excellent.  Went in and didn't have to wait.
All around experience was very good and pleasant.  Dr. Kwon asked certain questions and then examined me.  Both her and all the technicians are skilled at their professions.  
Highly recommend her and the practice.
Efficient, thorough and smart. Have been seeing Dr. Kwon for over 10 years.
Dr. Kwon is both extremely knowledgeable in her field and personable at the same time; someone you feel comfortable addressing any concern.  A perfect combination for a doctor.

Dr. Kwon is an excellent doctor. She is very friendly and extremely thorough. I had surgery with her years ago, that was the way i met her, and everything went really smooth and easy. Since then i have been going to her and she always takes her time to listen to her patients. She is just wonderful.
I’ve been seeing Dr. Kwon for 5 years and she’s always been very personable with me. Her down-to-earth nature puts me at ease and allows for an open dialogue between doctor and patient.
Thorough, direct, knowledgeable, kind. She is a terrific doctor.

reviewDetails.comment: I had hopes that Dr. Ast would professionally and competently review and help diagnose my issue. He unfortunately did nothing of the kind. He didn't offer much in the way of diagnosis, or advice. What really made me feel like Dr. Ast was not giving me the attention I hoped for was our follow up visit. My first visit he sent me to get Xrays at a third party facility, and three weeks later we had our follow up. Upon that follow up he had no idea who I was, seemingly no record or memory of our first visit. He asked if I'd ever been to him before. I reminded him of the xrays which he hastily pulled up and looked at extremely quickly. It was like a kid who didn't do his homework! Very unprofessional and disappointing. I won't recommend him and won't visit Dr. Ast again.

reviewDetails.comment: This ophthalmologist made me very uncomfortable by rushing the appointment, touching my eye with bare hands and what looked like artificial nails, and poking my inner eyelid with a q tip, irritating my eye. I also would not recommend because they make you pay up-front for the visit.
Dr. Dunbar is extremely professional and to the point. Her conversation is a curtesy, while she explains what affecting and possibly causing your issues.
She is very knowledgeable and patient!
Dr. Dunbar was easy to talk to and did her best to figure out my eye issue! It turned out not to be an issue in her specialty but she helped recommend me to someone who could possibly help!

I’m extremely pleased with the thorough and professional care I received from Dr. Dunbar.  She and her assistant Kate explained the procedure in detail and I was  very well prepared for the surgery and post-op care.  The results have improved not only my peripheral vision but eliminated the heaviness I felt daily just from blinking my eyes.  I highly recommend Dr. Dunbar.
Dr. Dunbar was very professional and knows what is needed. I will definitely use her again and I would refer to anyone.
They do not communicate with the patient. And being a new doctor they didn’t not my visit and kept calling me to come in.

reviewDetails.comment: Dr Rubenstein is attentive to my health and stays on top of changes in my eyes. She is careful to verify if any appearance of a change is significant or minor. She provides different ways of addressing and treating issues when necessary. She explains regularly and clearly when examining my eyes or when I myself raise concerns. Her office is well organized in returning phone calls or when I go to my appointments there. I feel confident that she is knowledgeable in her field. [PERSONAL INFO]
Her exam was thorough and she went through the treatment options in detail.
The visit is always really thorough and she and her team are professional and friendly.

She's straight to the point and is very diligent about the next steps to take-

I like that in a doctor-
I found the doctor to be thorough , methodical and direct. The Doctor resolved my immediate issue. Very positive experience.
She is very thorough and an expert in her field.
